statements: SELECT * FROM solo_traveler_expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT id, expense_date, category FROM solo_traveler_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT description FROM solo_traveler_expenses WHERE category = 'Accommodation'
SELECT expense_date, amount FROM solo_traveler_expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM solo_traveler_expenses WHERE category LIKE 'Fo%' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM solo_traveler_expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT description, amount FROM solo_traveler_expenses WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM solo_traveler_expenses GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT id, expense_date, category FROM solo_traveler_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND category IN ('Accommodation', 'Transportation')
SELECT * FROM solo_traveler_expenses WHERE description LIKE '%flight%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT traveler_name, trip_destination FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT trip_date, traveler_name FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 1;
SELECT traveler_id, expense_description, expense_amount FROM traveler_expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE trip_destination = 'Paris';
SELECT traveler_name, trip_date, expense_amount FROM solo_travelers INNER JOIN traveler_expenses ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = traveler_expenses.traveler_id;
SELECT traveler_name, trip_destination, trip_date FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE trip_destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, expense_description, expense_amount FROM solo_travelers JOIN traveler_expenses ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = traveler_expenses.traveler_id WHERE expense_amount > 100;
SELECT traveler_name, MAX(expense_amount) AS max_expense FROM solo_travelers JOIN traveler_expenses ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = traveler_expenses.traveler_id GROUP BY traveler_name;

SELECT traveler_name, COUNT(expense_id) AS num_expenses FROM solo_travelers LEFT JOIN traveler_expenses ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = traveler_expenses.traveler_id GROUP BY traveler_name HAVING num_expenses > 3;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT trip_name, destination FROM trips WHERE travel_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT budget_name, budget_amount FROM budgets WHERE budget_amount < 5000 ORDER BY budget_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses e JOIN budgets b ON e.expense_amount < b.budget_amount;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT trip_name, destination FROM trips ORDER BY travel_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT budget_name, budget_amount FROM budgets WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30'
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount <= 500 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers_expenses;
SELECT trip_name, amount FROM solo_travelers_expenses WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT expense_date, trip_name FROM solo_travelers_expenses WHERE trip_name = 'Paris Trip';
SELECT id, expense_description FROM solo_travelers_expenses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT e.*, c.category_name FROM solo_travelers_expenses e JOIN solo_travelers_expense_categories ec ON e.id = ec.expense_id JOIN solo_travelers_categories c ON ec.category_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers_expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT trip_name, expense_date, amount FROM solo_travelers_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT trip_name, budget FROM solo_travelers_budgets ORDER BY trip_name DESC

SELECT e.trip_name, e.expense_date, c.category_name FROM solo_travelers_expenses e JOIN solo_travelers_expense_categories ec ON e.id = ec.expense_id JOIN solo_travelers_categories c ON ec.category_id = c.id
SELECT trip_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM solo_travelers_expenses GROUP BY trip_name HAVING total_expenses > 5000
SELECT traveler_name, email_address FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT trip_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trips WHERE traveler_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount FROM budgets ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 1;
SELECT trip_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trips WHERE destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, email_address FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_name LIKE '%John%' AND email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT traveler_name, COUNT(trip_id) AS total_trips FROM solo_travelers LEFT JOIN trips ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = trips.traveler_id GROUP BY traveler_name HAVING total_trips > 2;
SELECT e.expense_id, e.description, e.amount, t.destination FROM expenses e, trips t WHERE e.trip_id = t.trip_id AND e.amount > 100 ORDER BY e.amount DESC;
